column3: School of Engineering and Applied Sciences
column5: Our MSc in Materials Engineering with Industry course is only open to International students.Gain two years' experience in the UK and the opportunity to work in collaboration with industry on a real-life challenge.This new MSc is an extension of our MSc in Materials Engineering and includes a second year allowing you to undertake either anindustry placementoran industry-focused projectwith an industrial partner.Why Materials Engineering with Industry at Swansea?Did you
column7: For current fees of the Materials Engineering with Industry course, please visit our website.
